title: 216 - Compound Problems
description:
Everyone has challenges but there are some people who allow these challenges to hold them back. On today’s podcast ET talks about the difference between people who fight the challenges and the ones who let the challenges defeat them. CJ chimes in on how important it is to stop focusing on the challenge itself and work towards a solution. Where your focus goes your energy flows and today’s podcast will help you refocus.
 The Secret to Success Topics:
  [05:00] - Rich Friends
 [10:45] - Challenges
 [17:40] - Don’t Be Weak
 [26:45] - Preach CJ
 [43:00] - Solution Oriented
 [1:04:00] - Go Get It
  Listener Perks:
  Organifi is giving our listeners 20% off of their order just go to www.organifi.com/success. Their superfood green juice powder allows you to get your greens anytime anywhere while on the go.
 Study when it’s convenient for you and take your mobile classroom wherever you go. Earn a quality online degree at an accredited college and enjoy all the benefits of the Ashford experience:   www.Ashford.edu/success

  Secrets 2 Success:
  If you handle it weak you’re teaching your kids to handle it weak.
 You don’t need your emotions to make a decision.
 Focusing on your problem will never get you anywhere.
 You don’t have to change a lot when you have the right mindset.
 The real work is in changing your mindset.
  ET Events: 
  1% Tour
 Make Real Estate Real
  Get connected with a network of over 3,500 people who listen to ET, and embodies the work ethic and spirit of ET. To learn more about Breathe University. Subscribe to the podcast via  Apple Podcasts.
